name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience crystal-clear audio with these true wireless earbuds. Featuring up to 8 hours of battery life per charge, ergonomic design for a comfortable fit, and seamless Bluetooth connectivity. Perfect for music, calls, workouts, and on-the-go listening.

name: Smartphone
description: Stay connected and productive with this latest smartphone. Features a high-resolution camera, fast processor, ample storage, and long-lasting battery. Ideal for photography, gaming, browsing, and multitasking with ease on the go.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy high-quality sound wherever you go with this portable Bluetooth speaker. Features deep bass, crisp treble, water-resistant design, and up to 10 hours of playtime. Perfect for indoor/outdoor use, parties, and travel.

name: Smart Watch
description: Monitor your health and stay active with this smart watch. Tracks steps, heart rate, sleep, and calories burned. Offers notifications, customizable watch faces, sleek design, and compatibility with multiple devices. Perfect for everyday wear and fitness tracking.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Improve your posture and comfort with this adjustable laptop stand. Made from lightweight aluminum, allows multiple height angles, increases airflow for cooling, and is compatible with laptops of all sizes. Perfect for office, home, or travel setups.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Expand your laptopâ€™s connectivity with this USB-C hub. Features HDMI output, multiple USB 3.0 ports, SD card slot, and fast data transfer. Compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for travel, office work, and productivity tasks.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Enhance your gaming experience with this RGB gaming mouse. Features adjustable DPI, ergonomic design for comfort during long sessions, programmable buttons, and smooth sensor tracking. Compatible with all major operating systems.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Type faster and more accurately with this mechanical keyboard. Features tactile switches for satisfying keystrokes, customizable LED lighting, durable build quality, and ergonomic layout. Perfect for work, gaming, or casual typing sessions.

name: Portable Charger
description: Keep your devices powered on the go with this portable charger. High-capacity battery, fast charging technology, multiple USB ports, compact design. Ideal for travel, work, or emergency backup power.

name: Smartphone Tripod
description: Capture perfect photos and videos with this flexible smartphone tripod. Adjustable legs, 360-degree rotation, lightweight and portable design. Compatible with most smartphones, ideal for photography, vlogging, and content creation.

name: Wireless Charger Pad
description: Charge your smartphone effortlessly with this Qi-certified wireless charging pad. Supports fast charging, non-slip surface, compact and sleek design, compatible with all Qi-enabled devices, ideal for home or office use.

name: Action Camera
description: Record all your adventures with this waterproof action camera. Features 4K video recording, wide-angle lens, image stabilization, and durable construction. Perfect for sports, travel, adventure, and outdoor activities.
